summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Friday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 10
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Friday, with three gaining and the other 16 declining.
Bitcoin fell 1.3% to $21,748 by market close.
